failed_checks.check_name: Containers should run as a high UID to avoid host conflict
code_block:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: spring-build-ci
spec:
  containers:
    - name: maven
      image: maven:alpine
      command:
        - cat
      tty: true
      volumeMounts:
        - name: m2
          mountPath: /root/.m2/
    - name: docker-tools
      image: rmkanda/docker-tools:latest
      command:
        - cat
      tty: true
      volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run
          name: docker-sock
        - mountPath: /tmp/trivycache/
          name: trivycache
    - name: trufflehog
      image: rmkanda/trufflehog
      command:
        - cat
      tty: true
    - name: licensefinder
      image: licensefinder/license_finder
      command:
        - cat
      tty: true
    - name: kaniko
      image: gcr.io/kaniko-project/executor:v1.6.0-debug
      imagePullPolicy: Always
      env:
        - name: container
          value: docker
      command:
        - sleep
      args:
        - 99d
      volumeMounts:
        - name: jenkins-docker-cfg
          mountPath: /kaniko/.docker
  volumes:
    - name: jenkins-docker-cfg
      projected:
        sources:
        - secret:
            name: regcred
            items:
              - key: .dockerconfigjson
                path: config.json
    - name: m2
      hostPath:
        path: /tmp/.m2/
    - name: docker-sock
      hostPath:
        path: /var/run
    - name: trivycache
      hostPath:
        path: /tmp/trivycache/

metadata:
  labels:
    app: spring-build-ci
spec:
  containers:
    - name: maven
      image: maven:alpine
      command:
        - cat
      tty: true
      volumeMounts:
        - name: m2
          mountPath: /root/.m2/
    - name: docker-tools
      image: rmkanda/docker-tools:latest
      command:
        - cat
      tty: true
      volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run
          name: docker-sock
        - mountPath: /tmp/trivycache/
          name: trivycache
    - name: trufflehog
      image: rmkanda/trufflehog
      command:
        - cat
      tty: true
    - name: licensefinder
      image: licensefinder/license_finder
      command:
        - cat
      tty: true
    - name: kaniko
      image: gcr.io/kaniko-project/executor:v1.6.0-debug
      imagePullPolicy: Always
      env:
        - name: container
          value: docker
      command:
        - sleep
      args:
        - 99d
      volumeMounts:
        - name: jenkins-docker-cfg
          mountPath: /kaniko/.docker
  volumes:
    - name: jenkins-docker-cfg
      projected:
        sources:
        - secret:
            name: regcred
            items:
              - key: .dockerconfigjson
                path: config.json
    - name: m2
      hostPath:
        path: /tmp/.m2/
    - name: docker-sock
      hostPath:
        path: /var/run
    - name: trivycache
      hostPath:
        path: /tmp/trivycache/

failed_checks.check_name: Ensure that Service Account Tokens are only mounted where necessary
code_block:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: spring-app
spec:
  containers:
    - name: app
      image: sample-app:latest
      resources:
        requests:
          memory: "64Mi"
          cpu: "250m"
        limits:
          memory: "128Mi"
          cpu: "500m"
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 10001
        allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        capabilities:
          drop:
            - "ALL"
          add: ["NET_ADMIN", "SYS_TIME"]
